text: Aldein () is a comune in South Tyrol in north Italy. It is about south of the city of Bolzano. Aldein is next to the these municipalities: Bronzolo, Montan, Deutschnofen, Auer, Truden and Ville di Fiemme. It has the frazione Radein (Redagno). == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in South Tyrol
title: Aldein
